text.author: Bananaplug, ButteBag, Pashley and others (see URL)
text.title: Isfahan
text.summary: This guide to Isfahan, a beautiful ancient city in Iran, details its architectural sites such as the Safavid era Naqsh-e Jahan Square and Chaharbagh Boulevard, four stunning mosques and three palaces, and the Armenian Quarter (Jolfa), as well as transport information on airport and taxi connections.
